alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 12:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Jackson, north central Gulf, northeastern Bay, Calhoun and southeastern Washington Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 130 PM EDT/1230 PM CDT/... At 1242 PM EDT/1142 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles northeast of Lynn Haven, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Altha, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Ocheesee, Selman, Abe Springs, Fountain, Singer Road, Bayou George, Camp Flowers, Chipola, Henderson Mill, Camps Head, Gainer Spring, Scotts Ferry, Kennys Mill, Bennett, Youngstown and Kinard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson
